name: OBI WORK: Agentic Liquidity Infrastructure
description: Autonomous AI agent infrastructure providing 24/7 liquidity and multi-strategy execution (Scalp, Day, Swing, Position, Arb) on Backpack Exchange. Designed to act as a 'Yield Farming Agent' for Perp DEXs across the Solana ecosystem, automating volume generation and point farming strategies.
solanaIntegration: Uses Solana Signer (Ed25519) to publish cryptographic receipts of every trading operation directly on-chain. Integrates AgentWallet for secure key management. Positioned as a plug-and-play volume farmer for any Solana Perp DEX (Backpack, Jupiter, Drift, Zeta).
